name: Low Poly traffic asset pack!
description:
This is a Low Poly Traffic asset pack ready for importing to game engines such as Unity, Unreal and Roblox Studio. The pack contains the following.

  • 6 Traffic Cone variations
  • 32+ main traffic sign variations
  • 1 Road block sign with 2 Variations

This pack will be getting updates with new assets added if you have any particular requests feel free to message me.
